title: [Massive] Adolescent Literature-Based Literacy Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading/writing proficiency and interest in adolescent literature
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing libraries and smartphones, emphasizing student-centered participatory activities

learning_goals: Learners can read three weekly texts (approximately 500 words each) from youth literature, generate three or more critical questions (e.g., "Which expressions reveal the authorâ€™s intent?") using a provided analytical framework (theme, style, character analysis), and write an analysis report rated over 80% appropriate by peer feedback.
Improving expressive skills and logical thinking through weekly discussions and writing activities (20% improvement in pre-post assessment comparisons).
Reporting a 15% or higher increase in learning motivation and positive growth experiences through self-efficacy scale measurements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
